title: Reset Password
content: Users can reset password from Settings > Security. Click on 'Forgot Password' and follow the email instructions.

title: Refund Policy
content: Refunds are allowed within 7 days of purchase. Contact support@example.com with your order number.

title: Account Creation
content: To create an account, click 'Sign Up' on the homepage and provide your email, username, and password.

title: Payment Methods
content: We accept credit cards (Visa, MasterCard, Amex), PayPal, and bank transfers.

title: Shipping Information
content: Standard shipping takes 5-7 business days. Express shipping is available for 2-3 day delivery.

title: Contact Support
content: You can reach our support team via email at support@example.com or call us at 1-800-SUPPORT during business hours (9 AM - 5 PM EST).
